archimate:Requirement.name: BC.1.1.1: A business continuity strategy covering the whole organisation should be developed and maintained, covering plans to be implemented before, during and after disruption, which is aligned with the organisation's business, IT and information security strategies.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
